item.title: Til: Helm Boolean Functions and Falsy-Ness
item.author: rouke@broersma.dev (Rouke Broersma)
item.description: Did you know Yaml is a superset of Json? Probably. Did you realize this means Yaml inherits some of the issues of Json? You’ve probably encountered this before yourself. But did you realize that helm template functions also inherit some of the Json issues? I sure didn’t until it bit me! Now a very common basic helm construct for dealing with default values is the following: apiVersion: v1 kind: ConfigMap metadata: name: my-cm data: mybool: {{ .
